repl_description:
A multilingual tourist spot information application with comprehensive language support for Japanese, English, and Chinese. The system implements a card-based interface with tourist location management, featuring both overview and detailed views through a responsive design. The application integrates an interactive OpenStreetMap interface with multilingual markers, popups, and thumbnail previews, alongside an image gallery system with carousel navigation.

The application architecture consists of a Python backend with PostgreSQL database integration, exposing RESTful API endpoints for CRUD operations on tourist spots. The system includes an administrative interface for comprehensive tourist spot management with multilingual content maintenance across all interfaces, including map markers, image captions, and spot descriptions, with persistent data storage and JSON serialization.
